title: CS > Kill participation
body:
The lengths i will go to to get my favourite champs to lvl 7.

afk farming for the win. Turns our its much more beneficial to abandon the team for 60 mins then it is to help out and get objectives. 

it proves that CS is one of the most crucial topics it grades you on (cos i had shit kill participation on account of avoiding almost every fight that took place) :P

replies.body: Afk farming might get you the tokens you are after but I doubt it'll make you any new friends ; )

We had a duo APC Nami/Alistar in the bot lane, a Vayne jungle, and a Jarvan who dedicated his whole game to 1 shotting ashe.. it was just a free for all. So i doubt my absence was missed too much.

how we won though.. I have no idea.
dat team comp.. and the way you mention what Jarvan did is op xD

He bought every single one of his items for the sole purpose of 1 shotting her, every fight he instantly made it a 4v4 (or 3v4 seeming i was never there) by taking out their ADC, but dying shortly afterwards... i guess it worked xD

> [{quoted}](name=GalaxyGladious,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7EzBwwFR,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-29T19:36:09.937+0000)
>
> Nasus wouldn't agree

I am a nasus main and sir you are completely and utterly correct.
Ive always said that cs is what determines it the most, its what I did for S+ etc is just ignore my team and powerfarm

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7EzBwwFR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-29T14:14:21.574+0000)
>
> Ive always said that cs is what determines it the most, its what I did for S+ etc is just ignore my team and powerfarm

so have I
Its a shame, that cs means nothing when you're a support, only way im getting an S out of them is to demolish a lane

It proves that you have to go out of your way to get an S, when the system should be you get Ss for dominating games. I have to Discord with my friends and get them to camp me so I can get fed enough without roaming to get an S, where as I should just get an S for going good in general. It's overall a horrible system.

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7EzBwwFR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-30T09:02:53.342+0000)
>
> It proves that you have to go out of your way to get an S, when the system should be you get Ss for dominating games. I have to Discord with my friends and get them to camp me so I can get fed enough without roaming to get an S, where as I should just get an S for going good in general. It's overall a horrible system.

its easy to understand if you play piss easy, low risk high reward champs like zed, buts its actually quite rare to find people get S on yasuo, because they all suck balls with him
